name: Pure Mind
description: Pure mind is a prototype of a virtual space emulation system. To make sure of its efficiency, its developers need volunteers to test. You were one of those. But everything was not so simple. In the power of the tester, dictating to you of the condition, the experimental is necessary to perform all the tests that the announcer puts, no...
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTFORCE 560 Storage: 1210 MB available space Sound Card: PCI-E Asus Xonar DSX Retail DSX/ASM
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTFORCE 710 Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: ASUS Xonar DG
